metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12248 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in mruby 1.4.1. There is a heap-based buffer over-read associated with OP_ENTER because mrbgems/mruby-fiber/src/fiber.c does not extend the stack in cases of many arguments to fiber.

criterions.comment: mruby: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
